dcterms:description: WebNLG+ 2020 is a dataset used in the WebNLG 2020 Challenge, comprising two tasks: RDF-to-text generation (G2T) and Text-to-RDF semantic parsing (T2G). It uses RDF to encode graphs as sets of triples associated with lexicalizations of sentences.
dcterms:title: WebNLG+ 2020

dcterms:creator: Oshin Agarwal
Heming Ge
Siamak Shakeri
Rami Al-Rfou
dcterms:description: TEKGEN is a dataset for generating graph-sentence alignments curated using Wikipedia and Wikidata, serving as a large-scale test-bed for both G2T and T2G tasks. The dataset lacks entity/relation/object boundaries, which complicates evaluation for T2G tasks.
dcterms:title: TEKGEN
